16  package org.atmosphere.cache;
17  
18  import org.atmosphere.cpr.AtmosphereResource;
19  import org.atmosphere.cpr.AtmosphereResourceEvent;
20  import org.atmosphere.cpr.BroadcasterCache;
21  import org.atmosphere.cpr.BroadcasterConfig;
22  import org.atmosphere.util.ExecutorsFactory;
23  import org.slf4j.Logger;
24  import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
25  
26  import java.util.ArrayList;
27  import java.util.Collections;
28  import java.util.HashSet;
29  import java.util.LinkedList;
30  import java.util.List;
31  import java.util.Map;
32  import java.util.Set;
33  import java.util.UUID;
34  import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
35  import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentLinkedQueue;
36  import java.util.concurrent.Executors;
37  import java.util.concurrent.ScheduledExecutorService;
38  import java.util.concurrent.ScheduledFuture;
39  import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
40  
41  /**
42   * An improved {@link BroadcasterCache} implementation that is based on the unique identifier (UUID) that all
43   * {@link AtmosphereResource}s have.
44   *
45   * @author Paul Khodchenkov
46   * @author Jeanfrancois Arcand
47   */
48  public class UUIDBroadcasterCache implements BroadcasterCache {
49  
50      private final static Logger logger = LoggerFactory.getLogger(UUIDBroadcasterCache.class);
51  
52      private final Map<String, ClientQueue> messages = new ConcurrentHashMap<String, ClientQueue>();
53      private final Map<String, Long> activeClients = new ConcurrentHashMap<String, Long>();
54      protected final List<BroadcasterCacheInspector> inspectors = new LinkedList<BroadcasterCacheInspector>();
55      private ScheduledFuture scheduledFuture;
56      protected ScheduledExecutorService taskScheduler;
57      private long clientIdleTime = TimeUnit.SECONDS.toMillis(60); // 1 minutes
58      private long invalidateCacheInterval = TimeUnit.SECONDS.toMillis(30); // 30 seconds
59      private boolean shared = true;
60      protected final List<Object> emptyList = Collections.<Object>emptyList();
61  
62      public final static class ClientQueue {
63  
64          private final ConcurrentLinkedQueue<CacheMessage> queue = new ConcurrentLinkedQueue<CacheMessage>();
65          private final Set<String> ids = new HashSet<String>();
66  
67          public ConcurrentLinkedQueue<CacheMessage> getQueue() {
68              return queue;
69          }
70  
71          public Set<String> getIds() {
72              return ids;
73          }
74  
75          @Override
76          public String toString() {
77              return queue.toString();
78          }
79      }
80  
81      @Override
82      public void configure(BroadcasterConfig config) {
83          Object o = config.getAtmosphereConfig().properties().get("shared");
84          if (o != null) {
85              shared = Boolean.parseBoolean(o.toString());
86          }
87  
88          if (shared) {
89              taskScheduler = ExecutorsFactory.getScheduler(config.getAtmosphereConfig());
90          } else {
91              taskScheduler = Executors.newSingleThreadScheduledExecutor();
92          }
93      }
94  
95      @Override
96      public void start() {
97          scheduledFuture = taskScheduler.scheduleWithFixedDelay(new Runnable() {
98              @Override
99              public void run() {
100                 invalidateExpiredEntries();
101             }
102         }, 0, invalidateCacheInterval, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS);
103     }
104 
105     @Override
106     public void stop() {
107         cleanup();
108 
109         if (taskScheduler != null) {
110             taskScheduler.shutdown();
111         }
112     }
113 
114     @Override
115     public void cleanup() {
116         if (scheduledFuture != null) {
117             scheduledFuture.cancel(false);
118             scheduledFuture = null;
119         }
120     }
121 
122     @Override
123     public CacheMessage addToCache(String broadcasterId, AtmosphereResource r, BroadcastMessage message) {
124 
125         Object e = message.message;
126         if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
127             logger.trace("Adding for AtmosphereResource {} cached messages {}", r != null ? r.uuid() : "null", e);
128             logger.trace("Active clients {}", activeClients());
129         }
130 
131         long now = System.currentTimeMillis();
132         String messageId = UUID.randomUUID().toString();
133         CacheMessage cacheMessage = new CacheMessage(messageId, e);
134         if (r == null) {
135             //no clients are connected right now, caching message for all active clients
136             for (Map.Entry<String, Long> entry : activeClients.entrySet()) {
137                 addMessageIfNotExists(entry.getKey(), cacheMessage);
138             }
139         } else {
140             String clientId = uuid(r);
141 
142             activeClients.put(clientId, now);
143             addMessageIfNotExists(clientId, cacheMessage);
144         }
145         return cacheMessage;
146     }
147 
148     @Override
149     public List<Object> retrieveFromCache(String broadcasterId, AtmosphereResource r) {
150         String clientId = uuid(r);
151         long now = System.currentTimeMillis();
152 
153         List<Object> result = new ArrayList<Object>();
154 
155         ClientQueue clientQueue;
156         activeClients.put(clientId, now);
157         clientQueue = messages.remove(clientId);
158         ConcurrentLinkedQueue<CacheMessage> clientMessages;
159         if (clientQueue != null) {
160             clientMessages = clientQueue.getQueue();
161 
162             for (CacheMessage cacheMessage : clientMessages) {
163                 result.add(cacheMessage.getMessage());
164             }
165         }
166 
167         if (logger.isTraceEnabled()) {
168             logger.trace("Retrieved for AtmosphereResource {} cached messages {}", r.uuid(), result);
169             logger.trace("Available cached message {}", messages);
170         }
171 
172         return result;
173     }
174 
175     @Override
176     public void clearCache(String broadcasterId, AtmosphereResource r, CacheMessage message) {
177         if (message == null) {
178             AtmosphereResourceEvent e = r.getAtmosphereResourceEvent();
179             logger.trace("Cached message is null for {}, but event was {}", r.uuid(), e == null ? "null" : e.getMessage());
180             return;
181         }
182 
183         String clientId = uuid(r);
184         ClientQueue clientQueue;
185         clientQueue = messages.get(clientId);
186         if (clientQueue != null) {
187             logger.trace("Removing for AtmosphereResource {} cached message {}", r.uuid(), message.getMessage());
188             clientQueue.getQueue().remove(message);
189         }
190     }
191 
192     @Override
193     public BroadcasterCache inspector(BroadcasterCacheInspector b) {
194         inspectors.add(b);
195         return this;
196     }
197 
198     protected String uuid(AtmosphereResource r) {
199         return r.uuid();
200     }
201 
202     private void addMessageIfNotExists(String clientId, CacheMessage message) {
203         if (!hasMessage(clientId, message.getId())) {
204             addMessage(clientId, message);
205         } else {
206             logger.debug("Duplicate message {} for client {}", clientId, message);
207         }
208     }
209 
210     private void addMessage(String clientId, CacheMessage message) {
211         ClientQueue clientQueue = messages.get(clientId);
212         if (clientQueue == null) {
213             clientQueue = new ClientQueue();
214             // Make sure the client is not in the process of being invalidated
215             if (activeClients.get(clientId) != null) {
216                 messages.put(clientId, clientQueue);
217             } else {
218                 // The entry has been invalidated
219                 logger.debug("Client is no longer active. Not caching message {}}", clientId, message);
220                 return;
221             }
222         }
223         clientQueue.getQueue().offer(message);
224         clientQueue.getIds().add(message.getId());
225     }
226 
227     private boolean hasMessage(String clientId, String messageId) {
228         ClientQueue clientQueue = messages.get(clientId);
229         return clientQueue != null && clientQueue.getIds().contains(messageId);
230     }
231 
232     public Map<String, ClientQueue> messages() {
233         return messages;
234     }
235 
236     public Map<String, Long> activeClients() {
237         return activeClients;
238     }
239 
240     protected boolean inspect(BroadcastMessage m) {
241         for (BroadcasterCacheInspector b : inspectors) {
242             if (!b.inspect(m)) return false;
243         }
244         return true;
245     }
246 
247     public void setInvalidateCacheInterval(long invalidateCacheInterval) {
248         this.invalidateCacheInterval = invalidateCacheInterval;
249         scheduledFuture.cancel(true);
250         start();
251     }
252 
253     public void setClientIdleTime(long clientIdleTime) {
254         this.clientIdleTime = clientIdleTime;
255     }
256 
257     protected void invalidateExpiredEntries() {
258         long now = System.currentTimeMillis();
259 
260         Set<String> inactiveClients = new HashSet<String>();
261         for (Map.Entry<String, Long> entry : activeClients.entrySet()) {
262             if (now - entry.getValue() > clientIdleTime) {
263                 logger.trace("Invalidate client {}", entry.getKey());
264                 inactiveClients.add(entry.getKey());
265             }
266         }
267 
268         for (String clientId : inactiveClients) {
269             activeClients.remove(clientId);
270             messages.remove(clientId);
271         }
272 
273         for (String msg : messages().keySet()) {
274             if (!activeClients().containsKey(msg)) {
275                 messages().remove(msg);
276             }
277         }
278     }
279 
280     @Override
281     public void excludeFromCache(String broadcasterId, AtmosphereResource r) {
282         activeClients.remove(r.uuid());
283     }
284 
285     @Override
286     public String toString() {
287         return this.getClass().getName();
288     }
289 }
